sentence.Network_en: She picked up a pink flower from a foxglove.
sentence.Network_cn: 她从毛地黄上摘了一朵粉花.
毛地黄会引起心脏衰竭.

sentence.Network_en: The common or pop purple foxglove produces pretty flowers along stamp leafy stem called a spike.
sentence.Network_cn: 普通紫色的毛地黄会开出沿着多叶的茎生长的好看的小花,这些笑话叫做穗.

目前已经分布到全世界。树叶大，有15-40厘米；春季开花，花型类似毛地黄，因此英语有时称其为毛地黄树（foxglove tree）。

entry.tran: 毛地黄(高大植物，开粉色或白色铃形花)
entry.def: A foxglove is a tall plant that has pink or white flowers shaped like bells growing up its stem.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several plants of the genus Digitalis

auth_sentence.content: Aspirin and Quinine come from trees, and digitalis, a medicine used in heart failure is extracted from the Foxglove.
